casebody.data:
MONTCLAIR STATE UNIVERSITY, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
COUNTY OF PASSAIC, Defendant,
and
City of Clifton, Defendant-Petitioner. C-328 September Term 2017
080084 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 29, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003318-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
